parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From a compound of a and stoichos; to miss the mark, i.e. deviate from truth.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and the base of trope; to deflect, i.e. Turn away.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Vain speaking, foolish talking. From mataiologos; random talk, i.e. Babble.
